collation.cr: [normalization on] [reorder Telu Deva Beng Guru Gujr Orya Taml Knda Mlym Sinh] # # The following tailoring is an adjustment of the # DUCET collation order for CANDRABINDU, ANUSVARA, # and VISARGA. Instead of being sorted with secondary # weights, they are collated on primary level between # the independent vowels and the consonants. # &ఔ<ఁ<ం<ః
